about.name: Nikhil
about.biography: Doing my Masters in Computer Science from Stevens Institute of Technology, Hoboken, NJ. Have a work experience of 20 months as a software engineer in L&T Infotech, Bangalore, India. Did my under graduate studies in Computer Science and Engineering from SASTRA University, India. \n Love watching movies, TV shows, going to beach, trekking and adventures. Sarcasm is inbuilt in my body, sorry can't help it. Long rides and crazy nights will be part of your life if you are my friend. You need more than a short bio to get to know me.

story.storyTitle: The time I felt iPhone's are over rated
story.story: I came from a place where iPhone is considered more of a brand value to the person rather than a good gadget. What comes along with it is the pride of having an iphone in a country where an under previliged family can live a whole year with the cost of one iphone. Last year when I purchased a new iPhone 7 within the first week of its release, peers at work were discussing about me for nearly a month. That's the value iPhone brings to a person in a country like India. But when I came here to USA I can see iphone's everywhere and with everyone. I guess iPhone is the only phone people here know. This is where I got to know what a waste its spending a ton on iphone and getting it in a country especially like ours. As a phone there are many great phones compared to Apple, so its always good to get a great deal of phones if we forget the brand value it gets and focus on the specs.
